'''Drained Conch Cup''' is a [[Quest Item]]. They can be converted into {{Item|Surging Sacred Chalice}} at the "Little Fountain" in [[Annapausis]] after completing the {{Quest|Rowboat's Wake (Quest)}}.

==Locations==
A total of 4 can be found:
* In the room with the [[Court of Fontaine Region#Ancient Notes|Ancient Notes]] and rifthounds in the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]]'s Submerged Ruins: Central Quartier level
*: <gallery>
Drained Conch Cup Location 1.png|Map location
Drained Conch Cup Location 1 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
* In a chest in [[The Narzissenkreuz Ordo]]
*: <gallery>
Drained Conch Cup Location 2.png|Map location
Drained Conch Cup Location 2 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
* In a chest in [[Bravais' Hidden Study]]
*: <gallery>
Drained Conch Cup Location 3.png|Map location
Drained Conch Cup Location 3 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
* In a chest in a cave north of [[Loch Urania]]
** This chest requires the completion of the {{Quest|The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes}}
*: <gallery>
Drained Conch Cup Location 4.png|Map location
Drained Conch Cup Location 4 Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
